cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Leg Shot
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(0)] [ARROWR] Target an opposing troop. If that troop is Marked, it gets -1[DEF] and Defensive. Otherwise, there's a 50% chance that troop gets -1[DEF] and Defensive.

cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Overwatch
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(0)] [ARROWR] You get "When an opposing troop enters play, if that troop is Marked, deal 4 damage to that troop. Otherwise, there's a 50% chance to deal 4 damage to that troop" until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Weight
cards.text: You can't choose to go first.

cards.name: Affinity: Warriors
cards.text: When you play a Warrior, gain a charge.

cards.name: Never Surrender
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(2)] [ARROWR] If you have 10 or less health, create a Never Surrender and put it into play.

cards.name: Unlock: Warlord War Machine
cards.text: Before the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, create two War Machines and put it into your deck. Otherwise, create a War Machine and put it into your deck.

cards.name: Training: Combat
cards.text:
At the start of the game, if you have 10 or more troops in your deck and/or hand, 25% of the troops in your deck become Trained.

Your Trained troops have +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

cards.name: Training: Deployment
cards.text: Your Trained troops have Speed.

cards.name: Fortifications
cards.text: Before the start of the game, create a Castle Wall and put it into play.

cards.name: Commander
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(2)] [ARROWR] Target troop you control battles target opposing troop.

cards.name: Old War Wound
cards.text: At the start of the game, create an Old War Wound and put it into your deck.

cards.name: Uzzu the Bonewalker
cards.text: [BASIC]: [4] [ARROWR] Gain a threshold of your choice.

cards.name: Hexshelled Turtle
cards.text:
[2][ARROWR] Troops you control gain a random wild or diamond socket this turn.

When this is dealt damage, prevent 1 damage.

cards.name: Shoku The Botanist
cards.text: [BASIC] [WILD]: [2] [ARROWR] Create a Dreadling and put it into play.

cards.name: Wildshaper Kaliban
cards.text: [BASIC] [WILD]: [5] [ARROWR] Transform target troop you control into a random troop with cost +[(2)].

cards.name: Lady Mariko
cards.text: [BASIC] [WILD][WILD]: [4] [ARROWR] Create a Mending Banner and put it into play.

cards.name: Grandfather Elk
cards.text: [BASIC] [WILD][WILD][WILD]: [4] [ARROWR] Target troop gets +3[ATK]/+3[DEF] and Crush this turn.

cards.name: Nineveh
cards.text: [BASIC] [SAPPHIRE][SAPPHIRE]: [9] [ARROWR] Create an Arcane Banner and put it into play.

cards.name: Kentigern Slate
cards.text: [BASIC] [SAPPHIRE], While you have three or more artifacts in your crypt: [4] [ARROWR] Create a War Bot and put it into play.

cards.name: Blue Sparrow
cards.text: [BASIC] [SAPPHIRE][SAPPHIRE][SAPPHIRE]: [3] [ARROWR] Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.name: Malzok
cards.text: [BASIC] [SAPPHIRE]: [3] [ARROWR] Stun target exhausted troop.

cards.name: Angus the Arsonist
cards.text: [BASIC] [RUBY][RUBY][RUBY]: [4] [ARROWR] Deal 4 damage to each opposing champion.

cards.name: Haraza the Incinerator
cards.text: [BASIC] [RUBY][RUBY]: [7] [ARROWR] Create a Burning Banner and put it into play.

cards.name: Lysander
cards.text: [BASIC] [RUBY], If an opposing champion was dealt damage this turn: [3] [ARROWR] Create a Valor and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Sharpshooter Sahas
cards.text: [BASIC] [RUBY]: [5] [ARROWR] Draw two cards. Discard a card at random.

cards.name: Two Tomahawks
cards.text: [BASIC] [DIAMOND][DIAMOND]: [6] [ARROWR] Create a Sacred Banner and put it into play.

cards.name: Marshal Josephina
cards.text: [BASIC] [DIAMOND]: [4] [ARROWR] Target troop gets "This can't block" and "This can't attack" until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Ada the Apparitionist
cards.text: [BASIC] [DIAMOND][DIAMOND][DIAMOND]: [5] [ARROWR] Create two Phantoms and put them into play.

cards.name: Bishop Elijah
cards.text: [BASIC] [DIAMOND]: [4] [ARROWR] Put target troop with cost [(2)] or less from your crypt into your hand.

cards.name: Bloodspinner Zorath
cards.text: [BASIC] [BLOOD][BLOOD]: [5] [ARROWR] Create a Dread Banner and put it into play.

cards.name: Renner
cards.text: [BASIC] [BLOOD]: [5] [ARROWR] Put the top card of each opposing champion's deck into your hand. The thresholds of that card all become [BLOOD].

cards.name: Paragon of Thought
cards.text:
[BASIC]: [1] [ARROWR] Create a random action that you meet the threshold requirements to play and put it into your hand.

When you play an action, create a random troop of the same shards and with the same cost as that action and put it into play.

cards.name: Gorn of the Hell Pits
cards.text: [BASIC] [BLOOD]: [3] [ARROWR] Target troop gets Rage 1.

cards.name: Takahiro
cards.text: [BASIC] [BLOOD][BLOOD][BLOOD]: [3], Sacrifice a troop [ARROWR] Draw a card. Gain 3 health.

cards.name: Shin'hare Explorers
cards.text:
At the start of the game, put the muscle, the tracker, the scholar, and the leader into play.

You cant lose the game while one of those four are in play.

cards.name: Coyotle Explorers
cards.text:
At the start of the game, put the muscle, the tracker, the scholar, and the leader into play.

You cant lose the game while one of those four are in play.

cards.name: The Chosen Ones
cards.text: Before the start of the game, a random troop in your deck gets Invincible.

cards.name: Discipline of the Mind
cards.text: [ONE-SHOT]: [(3)] [ARROWR] If you have a Blessing of the Immortals in your deck, put a random Blessing of the Immortals from your deck into your hand. Otherwise, put a random Blessing from your deck into your hand.

cards.name: Shrine of Briggadon
cards.text: Before the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, create two Shrines of Briggadon and put them into your deck. Otherwise, create a Shrine of Briggadon and put it into your deck.

cards.name: Premonitions
cards.text: At the start of the game, look at three random cards from your deck. Put up to one of those cards on top of your deck. Put the remaining cards into your deck.

cards.name: Holy Hands
cards.text: At the start of the game, create two copies of each card equipped with a Gloves equipment in your hand and put them into your deck. If you began the game with 100 or more cards in your deck, create two additional copies of each card equipped with a Gloves equipment in your hand and put them into your deck.

cards.name: SP Buff
cards.text: Before the start of the game, gain 1[SP].

cards.name: Replenish Spell Power
cards.text: [BASIC]: [2] [ARROWR] Gain 4[SP] to 5[SP] at random. Add two vulnerable counters to yourself.

cards.name: Replenish Spell Power
cards.text: [BASIC]: [2] [ARROWR] Gain 3[SP] to 5[SP] at random. Add two vulnerable counters to yourself.

cards.name: Learn Spell: Magic Barrier
cards.text: 5[SP] [ARROWR] Create a Magic Barrier and put it into play.

cards.name: Alchemy
cards.text: At the start of the game, a random non-resource card in your hand gets "When you play this, deal damage to a random opposing champion or troop equal to this card's cost."

cards.name: Magic Hat
cards.text: At the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, gain 4[SP] for each card equipped with a Head equipment in your hand. Otherwise, gain 2[SP] for each card equipped with a Head equipment in your hand.

cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Scattershot
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(0)] [ARROWR] Deal 1 damage to each opposing Marked troop. There's a 50% chance to deal 1 damage to each opposing troop without Marked.

cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Scattershot
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(0)], [ARROWR] Deal 1 damage to each opposing Marked troop. There's a 50% chance to deal 1 damage to each opposing troop without Marked. If you control a Shroomkin, destroy each damaged troop.

cards.name: Survive as a Group
cards.text: Before the start of the game, if you are a mercenary, gain a charge. Gain 2 health.

cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Rocket Launcher
cards.text: [ONE-SHOT]: [(4)] [ARROWR] You have a 50% chance to deal 7 damage to a random opposing champion or troop.

cards.name: RoBeast
cards.text: Before the start of the game, Beasts in your deck transform into replicas of themselves. They get +1[DEF].

cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Bow and Arrow
cards.text: [THREE-SHOT]: [(0)] [ARROWR] You have a 50% chance to deal 1 damage to target champion or troop.

cards.name: Planning Ahead
cards.text: At the start of the game, a random card in your hand with the highest cost gets cost -[(1)].

cards.name: Master Breeder
cards.text: When you create a Pet troop, there's a 50% chance that Pet gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

cards.name: Shard of Volosolov
cards.text: Before the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, create two Shards of Volosolov and put them into your deck. Otherwise, create a Shard of Volosolov and put it into your deck.

cards.name: Ranged Expertise: Spear
cards.text: [ONE-SHOT]: [(2)] [ARROWR] Target an opposing champion. If that champion is Marked, deal 5 damage to that champion. Otherwise, there's a 50% chance to deal 5 damage to that champion.

cards.name: Raiding Party
cards.text: [ONE-SHOT]: When a card leaves your hand, if you have no cards in your hand, repeat "choose one at random: Create a Ridge Raider and put it into play; create a Savage Raider and put it into play; or create a Scarless Raider and put it into play." two times.

cards.name: Good at Hiding
cards.text: [BASIC] [ONE-SHOT]: [(0)] [ARROWR] Add a hidden counter to yourself.

cards.name: Well-Fed Pet
cards.text: While you won the last encounter in this dungeon, #PET_BABY_SPIDER#s have +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

cards.name: Master of Webs
cards.text: When an opposing troop dies, if you began the game with 100 or more cards in your deck, create four Spiderling Eggs for each opposing champion and put them into their decks. Otherwise, create two Spiderling Eggs for each opposing champion and put them into their decks.

cards.name: Training: Combat
cards.text:
At the start of the game, if you have 10 or more troops in your deck and/or hand, 50% of the troops in your deck become Trained.

Your Trained troops have +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

cards.name: A Warrior's Guilt
cards.text: At the start of the game, create a A Warrior's Guilt and put it into your deck.

cards.name: Blacksmithing
cards.text:
While the top card of your deck is equipped with a Gloves equipment or equipped with a Trinket equipment or equipped with a Weapon equipment, you can see the top card of your deck.

While the top card of your deck is equipped with a Gloves equipment or equipped with a Trinket equipment or equipped with a Weapon equipment, you can play the top card of your deck.

While you began the game with 100 or more cards in your deck and the top card of your deck is equipped, you can see the top card of your deck.

While you began the game with 100 or more cards in your deck and the top card of your deck is equipped, you can play the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Cleanse
cards.text: [ONE-SHOT]: [(0)] [ARROWR] Remove all burning counters from you. Gain 2 health for each burning counter removed this way. Remove all dazed counters from you. Gain 2 health for each dazed counter removed this way. Remove all vulnerable counters from you. Gain 2 health for each vulnerable counters removed this way.
